title: Wang Family’s Peasant Woman: Raising kids and Making wealth - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Historical   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Ancient China   Business Management   Cute Children   Doting Love Interests   Female Protagonist   Hard-Working Protagonist   Marriage   Poor Protagonist   Poor to Rich   Secret Identity   Transmigration
author: Yuxiang Pork Bun   鱼香肉丝包
description:
After blowing up the car of her husband and his mistress. Gu Chunzhu, a business entrepreneur, opened her eyes and transmigrated to Xiaohetou Village, Ming Dynasty which was not in history. 

Having a crippled husband, two small skinny children. A thatched house, that seemed to collapse anytime and will leak when it rains.

 It won’t be easy…>
